tree.name: Mark Williams
tree.tradeDescription: Suns traded McNeeley, Micić, 2029 1st (least favorable) for Williams and 2029 2nd (PHO own)

assetsGivenUp.name: Liam McNeeley
assetsGivenUp.note: Drafted 29th overall by Phoenix (pick acquired from Utah via Cleveland)

assetsGivenUp.name: Vasilije Micić
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Suns traded Nurkić to Hornets for Martin and Micić
assetsGivenUp.note: Serbian guard, acquired from Charlotte in Nurkić trade

assetsGivenUp.name: Jusuf Nurkić
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: 3-team trade: Lillard to Bucks, Ayton/Camara to Blazers, Allen/Nurkić/Little/Johnson to Suns
assetsGivenUp.note: Bosnian center, acquired from Portland in Lillard 3-team trade. PHX sent Ayton + Camara to POR.

assetsGivenUp.name: Deandre Ayton
assetsGivenUp.note: 2018 #1 overall pick by Phoenix. Sent to POR in Lillard 3-team trade.

assetsGivenUp.name: Toumani Camara
assetsGivenUp.note: 2023 #52 pick by Phoenix. Sent to POR in Lillard 3-team trade.

assetsGivenUp.name: 2029 1st Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Least favorable of CLE, UTA, MIN picks (acquired from Utah Jan 21, 2025)
